sense.def:
Consideration
je pozorno razmišljanje o nečem.

seg.quote: After careful consideration, her parents gave her permission.

sense.def:
Oseba, ki kaže
consideration
, je pozorna do potreb, želja ali čustev drugih.

seg.quote: He showed no consideration for his daughters.

sense.def:
A consideration
je tisto, o čemer bi morali razmisliti, kadar nekaj načrtujemo ali ko se za nekaj odločamo.

seg.quote: An important consideration is the amount of time it will take.

sense.def:
To take something into consideration
pomeni razmišljati o nečem, ker je bistvenega pomena za tisto, kar počnemo.

seg.quote: The first thing one has to take into consideration is the cost.

sense.def:
O tistem, kar je
under consideration
, razpravljamo.

seg.quote: The case was still under consideration.
